sentences.en: Article 33. This Bylaw the first day of July of 1991.
sentences.cn: 第三十三条本细则自一九九一年七月一日起施行.

sentences.en: Article 75 Time periods shall include those prescribed bylaw and those designated by a people's court.
sentences.cn: 第七十五条期间包括法定期间和人民法院指定的期间.

sentences.en: Under the company's bylaws, he can continue as chairman until the age of 70.
sentences.cn: 按照公司的规章，他能继续担任主席职位到70岁。

words.tran_cn: 次要法规；细则；地方法则；（社团制定的）内部章程

trans.tran_cn: 次要法规，（社、团制定的）规章制度
trans.tran_en: a law made by a local government that people in that area must obey
